definition[0]: something that is sent to people by post, especially to advertise something
example[0]: A catalogue and order form are included with this mailing.
example[1]: A mailing had gone out to every school in the country.
definition[1]: the process of sending something to people by post
example[2]: A very effective mailing of product samples was carried out last year.
definition[2]: an occasion when information or advertising material is sent through the mail to a large number of people at one time, or the information or advertising material sent in this way

example[5]: She follows up the mailings with phone calls.
